6.title: A New Life on Lake Lanier in Georgia
6.plot:

7.title: A Cnetral Florida Pet Paradise in Highlands County
7.plot:

10.title: Docking at Lake Greenwood
10.plot:

1.title: A Chalet by the Lake
1.plot: Gail and Picha grew up spending their summers by the lake and have dreamt of giving their daughters the same vacation experiences. Only an hour and a half outside of their St. Louis, Innsbrook Resort is the perfect weekend escape.

2.title: A Rocky Mountain Roost
2.plot: A job opportunity for Mike has moved the DeBell family from the California coast to Colorado, but without a nearby ocean they are missing the water. They've decided a vacation home in nearby Summit County is a must.

3.title: Searching for a Lakefront Home in the Lone Star State
3.plot: A family loves spending their weekends unwinding lakeside. Ready to make vacation life a weekly ritual, Kevin and Melinda embark on a house hunt to find the perfect second home in Sequin, Texas

4.title: A Northwoods Cabin
4.plot: In love with the Wisconsin cabin lifestyle, Tim and Kelly reach out to local real estate agent, Dan McNulty, to help them find the perfect lakefront home in the Northwoods area all for under $325,000.

5.title: A Wake Zone to Call Home
5.plot: Brett and Sarah are a young couple just starting out on their adventure together, but after both growing up in Michigan, the one thing they're sure of is there's no place like home on a lake.

6.title: Pocono Paradise
6.plot: A family busy family dreams of spending outdoor summers splashing around in a vacation property of their own. Just an hour from home, they have fallen for Blakeslee, PA - a water lover's wonderland nestled in the Pocono Mountains.

7.title: Off We Go to Lake Winnebago
7.plot: Tired of their apartment and ready for the water, a couple searches for a home on Lake Winnebago, WI.

8.title: Sleepless for Sleepy Hollow
8.plot: A couple searches Sleepy Hollow Lake, New York, to find a lakefront home for their kids to experience the great outdoors.

9.title: Lake Union Launch
9.plot: A couple hopes to purchase a houseboat on Lake Union in Seattle, Washington, after living in the landlocked Arizona desert for eight years.

10.title: Searching for Brant Lake Bliss
10.plot: A couple hopes to buy a lake house on Brant Lake in the southern Adirondacks of NY.

11.title: Fall for the Cumberland
11.plot: A Kentucky couple comes to Lake Cumberland to find a houseboat for their water-crazed family.

12.title: Aroostook County, the Crown of Maine
12.plot: A new couple hopes to blend their two families under one lakefront roof in Aroostook County, Maine.

13.title: Calming Cayuga Lake
13.plot: The beauty of Cayuga Lake is uncovered during a New York couple's search for a lakefront home.

1.title: Penn Yan Peace of Mind
1.plot: A couple hopes to purchase a lakefront home on Keuka Lake in Penn Yan, NY.

2.title: A Couple Searches for Their Dream Home on the Shore of Beautiful Lake Kerr in Clarksville, VA
2.plot: The search for a weekend escape in Clarksville, Va., for a family of four proves challenging on a budget of $250,000.

3.title: An Indiana Couple Caravans Down to Tennessee
3.plot: Finding a getaway that offers privacy for less than $350,000 is trickier than expected for a couple searching in Norris Lake, Tenn.

4.title: Maine's Majestic Moosehead Lake
4.plot: A real-estate agent has a budget of $100,000 when she looks for a vacation getaway for her own family of seven on Moosehead Lake in Maine.

5.title: Livin' in Luxury in Slidell, LA on Lake Pontchartrain
5.plot: A couple search in Slidell, La., for a luxury home with a pool and access to Lake Pontchartrain, plus a price tag of less than $350,000.

6.title: Retreating to Table Rock Lake in Southwestern Missouri
6.plot: A couple who want to escape their busy lives look for a $350,000 weekend retreat on Table Rock Lake in Southwestern Missouri.

7.title: Home Sweet Home Lake Martin, Alabama
7.plot: A couple tour Lake Martin, Ala., in search of a vacation home priced less than $300,000.

8.title: Kickin' Back on Lake Keowee, SC
8.plot: A couple seeks to fulfill their lifelong dream of lakefront living on Lake Keowee, SC.

9.title: Livin' Large in Lake County, FL
9.plot: A bigger home with a better view is sought by a woman and her three children in Lake County, Fla., who have $275,000 to spend on their dream abode.

10.title: All in the Family in Lake Martin, Alabama
10.plot: A couple search for a $375,000 home to put down roots and start a family in Lake Martin, Ala.

11.title: Ducking High Prices in Tallahassee
11.plot: New parents want a bigger house near a tranquil lake in Tallahassee, and they are hoping their real-estate agent can keep the cost below $350,000.

12.title: Lovin' Life on Lake Greenwood, South Carolina
12.plot: A couple returns home to the lake in Alabama to put down their own roots.

13.title: Kicking Back on Indiana's Koonz Lake
13.plot: A couple that grew up spending time on the water looks to buy a home on Koontz Lake in Indiana where they can enjoy time with their daughters. They enlist a real estate agent to help them find the perfect home for under $399,000.

1.title: Heading Home to the Lakes of Hot Springs, Arkansas
1.plot: Elizabeth and Scott spent summers growing up on the lakes of Hot Springs, Arkansas. After living in Virginia for over a decade, they are ready to return to their roots with their son Jackson to find a lakefront home.

2.title: Lounging at North Carolina's Lovely Lake Norman
2.plot: Featured: a family hoping to buy a waterfront property on Lake Norman in North Carolina.

3.title: Destination Deer Lake, WA
3.plot: A family of four from Spokane, Wash., are ready to invest in a close-to-home getaway on Deer Lake for under $360,000.

4.title: Take a Break on Smith Lake, Alabama
4.plot: Joseph and Leslie live in Birmingham, AL, with their two kids. After careful planning, they're ready to look for a vacation home on Smith Lake where they can enjoy time together as a family. Can they find it for under $350,000?

5.title: Legacy on Logan Martin Lake, Alabama
5.plot: A home along the shores of Logan Martin Lake is sought by a family who have a special attachment to this favorite Alabama vacation spot.

6.title: Sunsets and Savings on Lake Champlain New York
6.plot: A couple who have a special fondness for Lake Champlain in Upstate New York search for an escape from their hectic city lives.

7.title: Letting Loose on Lake Chatuge on the Border of Georgia and North Carolina
7.plot: A Florida couple hope to buy a $320,000 home on Lake Chatuge in order to enjoy quality time relaxing with their 5-year-old daughter.

8.title: A Stone's Throw to Chaumont, New York on Luxurious Lake Ontario
8.plot: Avid sailors hope to buy a $250,000 home closer to their yacht club on Lake Ontario in Chaumont, N.Y.

9.title: Shopping for a Lakefront Property in Grand Lake, CO
9.plot: An outdoor-loving Florida couple look for a vacation retreat in Grand Lake, Colo., with a price tag of $375,000 in mind.

10.title: Cashing in on Cherokee Village in the Heart of Arkansas
10.plot: A family of four look for a lakefront home in Cherokee Village, Ark., with the hope of finding a property for less than $199,000, even if it means taking on a project.

11.title: Poking Around for a Place in Polk County, WI
11.plot: Mike and Sara live in Celebration, FL, but both grew up in the Midwest spending summers on the lake. Now that they have a son, they want to create those memories by purchasing a rustic retreat in Frostproof, FL, for $375,000.

12.title: Dropping Anchor in the Lake of the Ozarks
12.plot: Storage for a boat is top on the must-have list when a family search for a lakefront getaway for $225,000 or less in Missouri.

13.title: Looking for the Bare Necessities on Big Bear Lake, Ca.
13.plot: Sisters in San Diego search for a cozy cabin on Big Bear Lake where their families can spend time together and enjoy year-round recreational activities.

1.title: Cruising Along Canyon Lake, Texas, for Lakefront Bargain
1.plot: New parents who have spent their summers on Canyon Lake, Texas, since they were in their college years hope to find a weekend getaway where they can balance out their busy lifestyles with more fun times by the water.

2.title: Searching for Serenity on Sebago Lake, Maine
2.plot: A family who enjoy the stunning shores of Sebago Lake, Maine, hope to find a home there for less than $300,000.

3.title: Sailing Like a Pro in Chaumont, New York on Luminous Lake Ontario
3.plot: After years of commuting back and forth to go sailing, Gates and Rene are ready to move their family right on the water in Chaumont, NY. They hope to find the perfect waterfront home on Lake Ontario for $250,000.

4.title: Seeking a Right Sized Retreat on Pokegama Lake
4.plot: A couple seeks a lakeside retreat on Table Rock Lake in Missouri.

5.title: Finding a Place to Fish in Frostproof, Florida
5.plot: A family search for a rustic retreat for only $375,000 in Frostproof, Fla.

6.title: Searching California for a Spot on the Shore at Lake Almanor
6.plot: Dan and Staci are from Reno, Nevada and they both spent their summers on Lake Almanor in California. Now, they want their two kids to grow up on the lake just like they did and they're looking for a lakeside retreat.

7.title: On Our Way to Lake Winnipesaukee
7.plot: Space and convenience are top on the must-have list when a couple search for a vacation home within their budget of $375,000 on Lake Winnipesaukee in New Hampshire.

8.title: Cashing in on a Deal in Cass County, MI
8.plot: A couple and a mother search for a steal on a lakefront home in Cass County, Mich.

9.title: A Lake Champlain Staycation in Burlington, Vermont
9.plot: Roommates hope to gain a home on Lake Champlain, Vt., for only $360,000.

10.title: Hidden Gem in New York's Hudson Valley
10.plot: A Brooklyn couple search for a home on New York's Copake Lake in the Hudson Valley.

11.title: Waking Up on Lake Waynoka, Oh
11.plot: A couple search for a house on Lake Waynoka, Ohio.

12.title: Gearing Up for Lake Gaston, NC
12.plot: A family search for a home on Lake Gaston, N.C.

13.title: Something Unique on Deep Creek Lake in Maryland
13.plot: A Maryland couple search for a lakefront vacation home on Deep Creek Lake.

1.title: Nothin' Like Lake Nottely
1.plot: With a very hectic home life, a couple look for a place to get away and relax. Upon discovering the hidden gem of Lake Nottely, just two hours outside of Atlanta, they decide this would be the ideal place for their lakefront vacation house. With the help of a real estate agent, they hope to find the perfect lakeside home for under $350,000.

2.title: Adirondack Escape
2.plot: A family hopes to purchase a home in the Adirondack region of New York.

3.title: A Life to Pursue on Tippecanoe Lake, Indiana
3.plot: A recent college graduate hopes to find a Tippecanoe lake house of her own for $199,000 or less.

4.title: The Allure of Lake Lure
4.plot: A couple hopes to purchase a home on the shores of Lake Lure, NC.

5.title: Vets on Vacation in Innsbrook, Missouri
5.plot: Veterinarians from Wildwood, Mo., are looking for a nice spot to vacation with their two children. After learning about the premier gated community of Innsbrook, they decide it's the perfect place to search for their lakefront retreat for under $300,000.

6.title: Securing a Future on Sinclair
6.plot: A couple pursues their dream of owning a home on Lake Sinclair in Georgia.

7.title: Taking Stock in a Tennessee Treasure on Douglas Lake
7.plot: A soon-to-be family of five look for a lakefront vacation home on Douglas Lake in eastern Tennessee. They're working with their real-estate agent to find the perfect relaxation stop for both their family and the families they hope will rent their home.

8.title: Making the Most of Moses Lake, Washington
8.plot: What's the point of growing up in Moses Lake, Wash., if you can't live on the beautiful lake that surrounds it? Dean and Maura are in search of a forever home to make sure that their daughters have that experience. With a budget of $350,000, the Washington natives are ensuring their kids have the full Washington experience, without breaking the bank of course.

9.title: Cruising the Chain of Lakes in Winter Haven, Florida
9.plot: A couple hope to find a home on the Chain of Lakes in Winter Haven, FL.

10.title: Weiss Lake, Alabama
10.plot: Steve, Roxann and their children live in Alabaster, AL, and vacation at Logan Martin Lake. Because most of the trips are short, the couple wants to purchase a home so the family can enjoy the lake for extended periods of time.

11.title: Living Full-Time on Lake Erie, Ohio
11.plot: College sweethearts are looking for their first home together along the shores of Lake Erie in Lakewood, Ohio. They enlist the help of his mother, a real-estate agent, but find that their ideal location may be harder on the budget than expected.

12.title: An Alabama Panorama on Smith Lake
12.plot: A family of four from Lewisburg, Tenn., currently live on a farm without much water nearby, even though they own a boat They've spent time visiting Alabama's Smith Lake, and with the kids getting older, now seems like the perfect time to buy a place of their own. With the help of a real-estate agent, they hope to find the perfect lakefront property for under $350,000.

13.title: Taking a Look at Innsbrook, Missouri
13.plot: Siblings Greg and Lisa want to purchase a lakefront home with their families in Innsbrook, MO. Greg is hesitant to take the plunge, so his sister and their spouses try to convince him that it's a perfect place for a vacation home.

1.title: Serenity in South Haven
1.plot: Chicago city dwellers are on the hunt for an escape from the hustle and bustle of their busy lives. Even though their primary residence is near Lake Michigan, they want a place on the lake that feels more like the country, where they both grew up. After checking out various locations, they discover the quaint town of South Haven, Mich. They fell in love with the place and hope to find the perfect lakefront vacation home for under $300,000.

2.title: Heading for the Irish Hills of Michigan
2.plot: A couple looks for a lakefront home in the Irish Hills region of Michigan.

3.title: Settling in on Seneca Lake, New York
3.plot: Pam and Rick live in Mount Airy, Maryland, with their two children. After years of visiting Pam's family in central New York, they discovered the nearby Finger Lakes region and fell in love. They are sold on Seneca Lake's wineries, waterfalls and picturesque farmland and are ready to commit to the area by purchasing a lakefront vacation home. A local real-estate agent will help this family of four settle into the sloping hills of Seneca Lake, all for under $250,000.

4.title: Moving Within Missouri City, Texas
4.plot: Desmond and Khristy currently live in Missouri City, Texas, with their two kids, Kennedy and Kortlandt. They love being close to the water, but wish they had a lake right in their backyard. With all of the great lakefront communities sprouting up in the area, they think now is the perfect time to make their move, so they're looking for a new waterfront home for under $375,000.

5.title: Trekking to Tims Ford Lake
5.plot: A family hopes to purchase a permanent home on Tims Ford Lake in Tennessee.

6.title: Brainerd Lakes Family Escape
6.plot: A family of five from Minneapolis search for a home along the picturesque shores of the Brainerd Lakes region in central Minnesota, where they have enjoyed vacationing together for several years. With a tight budget of $199,000, they might not be able to get everything on their wish list, so they hire a local real-estate agent to aid with the search.

7.title: Deep Creek Lake, Maryland
7.plot: A family of three hope to buy a vacation home in the ski town of Deep Creek Lake, Maryland. Can they find the perfect lakeside home for under $365,000?

8.title: Adams Lake, Indiana
8.plot: A Indiana family hopes to buy a lakefront vacation home for under $325,000 on Adams Lake.

9.title: Looking to Dock on Castle Rock
9.plot: Dana and Tyler are from the suburbs of Chicago and struggle to find time to get out on the water with their kids. With the help of a local real-estate agent, they hope to find the perfect lakefront vacation home in Castle Rock Lake for under $350,000. Tyler grew up in Wisconsin and is familiar with Castle Rock Lake, which is a good midway point between their permanent home and their friends and family.

10.title: Moving Over to Owasco Lake, NY
10.plot: A move to Owasco Lake, N.Y., by a couple and their son, who currently reside in San Diego, an area they love, but they miss their family and the nature of New York State.

11.title: To Deep Creek Lake, Maryland and Beyond
11.plot: A couple from Gaithersburg, Maryland, visit Deep Creek Lake together, and both fall in love with the year-round attractions that the area offers. Since recently purchasing a boat, they are ready to buy, but for less than $300,000.

12.title: Seeking Serenity in Central Minnesota
12.plot: Newly engaged Jordan and Nick are on the hunt for their first home. They have been visiting the lakes of central Minnesota since they were children, and with Nick stationed in the area, they think a lake home will make for a perfect permanent home. With plenty of outdoor activities, the area offers the opportunity to find a fun getaway home with a chance to get in touch with nature. A local real-estate agent helps these soon-to-be newlyweds search for their first home under $229,000.

13.title: Kicking Back on Indiana's Koontz Lake
13.plot: A couple hopes to find the perfect vacation home in Indiana for under $399,000 with the help of a real-estate agent. Chris and Jim from Palos Heights, Illinois, both grew up spending time on the water. They've brought their three daughters to Paw Paw Lake, Michigan, every summer, hoping to provide them with similar childhood memories and now want a home in nearby Koontz Lake.

6.title: Getting Away on Greenlake, South Carolina
6.plot:

8.plot:

10.title: Ready to Relax on Rough River Lake, Kentucky
10.plot:

-1.title: Leaving the City for More Space on Lake Jackson
-1.plot: An Atlanta couple is ready to ditch their city condo for a home with space for their growing family. Georgia's Lake Jackson has always held a special place in their hearts, so they're ready to find a place on the water.

imdb.title: Lakefront Bargain Hunt
plot: Dreams of living on the dock of the bay can come true, even on the tightest budget. We show home seekers how to find the lakefront property of their dreams without breaking the bank.
